site.title: AstrBot | Open-Source All-in-One Agent Chatbot Platform
site.description: AstrBot is an open-source Agent chatbot platform that plugs into Discord, QQ, WeCom, Feishu, Telegram, DingTalk, KOOK and more, giving individuals, developers, and teams a reliable and scalable conversational infrastructure to ship AI companions, smart support, automation assistants, and enterprise knowledge bots fast.

models.title: Supported Model Providers
models.subtitle: Support for Text Gen, Vision, STT, TTS, Embedding and more

plugins.title: Rich Plugin Ecosystem
plugins.subtitle: Extend bots easily for various scenarios

community.title: Thriving Community
community.subtitle: Small sparks can start a prairie fire.

more.title: More things
more.kbDesc: Built-in AI knowledge base, zero hassle

platforms.more: For more platform integrations, please refer to the documentation.
